headline: Leidos price target lowered to $204 from $216 at UBS
summary: UBS lowered the firm’s price target on Leidos (LDOS) to $204 from $216 and keeps a Neutral rating on the shares. This quarter appears more selective, with more negative than positive stock reactions, even as commercial OE build rates continue to improve, demand remains strong, and supply chains look stable, supporting a shift toward normalized earnings valuations, the analyst tells investors in a research note.
